enablestyles.fieldDescription: This mode allows author to enable styles in preview mode.Make sure to uncheck after preview.
enablestyles.name: ./style

serviceorder.fieldDescription: Select the service that appears by default
serviceorder.text: Select the service that needs to be appeared top in the list

hideloginform.fieldDescription: Sets whether to hide the login form.
hideloginform.name: ./hideloginformolb

formactionurl.fieldDescription: Sets where to send login form data
formactionurl.name: ./formActionOlb

gateway.fieldDescription: Sets the gateway used to authenticate the request
gateway.name: ./gatewayOlb

username.fieldDescription: Sets the placeholder text for the username form field
username.name: ./usernameplaceholderolb

password.fieldDescription: Sets the placeholder text for the password form field
password.name: ./passwordplaceholderolb

remembermeolb.fieldDescription: Sets whether to display remember me for OLB
remembermeolb.name: ./remembermeolb

remembermetext.fieldDescription: Sets the text displayed next to the remember me checkbox
remembermetext.name: ./remembermetextolb

encryptionfile.fieldDescription: Sets the path to the encryption file
encryptionfile.name: ./encryptionFileOlb

hiddenval.fieldDescription: Click 'Add Field' to add multiple hidden input fields embedded within the form.

name.fieldDescription: Sets the name of the hidden input field
name.name: ./hiddenNameOlb

value.fieldDescription: Sets the value of the hidden input field
value.name: ./hiddenValueOlb

pages.fieldDescription: Click 'Add Field' to add a new Maintenance Message

maintenancemessagetype.fieldDescription: Sets the type of the maintenance message to be displayed.
maintenancemessagetype.name: ./messagetype

message.fieldDescription: Sets the message to be displayed
message.name: ./maintenancemessage

signonsupport.fieldDescription: This is the static support content displayed beneath the login form for OLB
signonsupport.name: ./signonsupportolb

supportlinks.fieldDescription: Sets support links displayed beneath the login form for OLB

url.fieldDescription: Sets the url target for the button
url.name: ./linkURL

urlParams.fieldDescription: Sets the link parameters applied to the url. e.g. param1=value1&param2=value2
urlParams.name: ./urlParams

target.fieldDescription: Sets the window target for the link
target.name: ./target

enableinhero.fieldDescription: Sets whether to enable this support link in hero for OLB
enableinhero.fieldLabel: Enable Link in Hero for OLB?
enableinhero.name: ./enableLinkInHero
